weapon.name: Shadoweave
weapon.description: The initial design shows it to be a lightweight and covert concealed weapon, but it's changed to a heavy blade by the user's own request. It's heavy and not like a concealed weapon at all.

weaponEffects.title: Altered Damage
weaponEffects.description: When pairing Shadoweave with other weapons, the **Weapons Master** effect can be created. Epiphyllum will appear around the target randomly and explode within **1–3** seconds, dealing **37.5%** area damage.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, use Shadoweave to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **59.9%** of ATK plus **359**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **57.1%** of ATK plus **343**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **49.5%** of ATK plus **297**. 
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **114.2%** of ATK plus **685** and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **152.2%** of ATK plus **913**.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.6%** of ATK plus **184**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **55.6%** of ATK plus **334**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **48.2%** of ATK plus **289**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **111.2%** of ATK plus **667**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **148.3%** of ATK plus **890**.

normals.name: Scattered Soil
normals.description:
After the second normal attack on the ground or in mid-air, hold normal attack to trigger Scattered Soil.
Attack the target position, dealing damage equal to **83.2%** of ATK plus **499** and knocking the target down.
Passive: After unleashing Scattered Soil on the ground, rapidly tapping normal attack will immediately unleash Brief Bloom (the **3**rd stack).

normals.name: Brief Bloom
normals.description:
Hold normal attack to unleash Brief Bloom. Can be charged for up to **3** stacks, gaining hyperbody and control immunity during charging.
First stack: Deal damage equal to **73.9%** of ATK plus **443**.
Second stack: Deal damage equal to **146.2%** of ATK plus **877**.
Third stack: Deal damage equal to **246.4%** of ATK plus **1478**.

normals.name: Falling Shadow
normals.description:
Hold normal attack in mid-air to trigger Falling Shadow.
Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to **160%** of ATK plus **960** and knocking the target down.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Leafy Green
dodge.description:
Unleash Leafy Green at the target while performing a backflip, dealing damage equal to **70%** of ATK plus **420**, generating **1–3** epiphyllums upon hit, and forming a Green Field that lasts for **5** seconds. When enemies in the Green Field lock onto the Wanderer, their movement speed is reduced by **50%**.
Passive: Can be unleashed on the ground or mid-air.
Passive: Immediately break the control if under control effect and automatically release Leafy Green without using any dodge attempts. Skill cooldown lasts for **20** seconds.

skill.name: Moonlight Realm
skill.description:
Create a Moonlight Realm around yourself for **15** seconds. Your attack in the realm is increased by **15%**, jumping ability increased by **20%**, and endurance consumption reduced by **50%**. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
Enter the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm. Your fall speed is greatly reduced and you can perform multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target. Upon hit, deal damage equal to **66%** of ATK plus **396** and randomly generate **1–3** epiphyllums.

Passive: In the Moonlight Realm, **1** epiphyllum will be generated near **1** target every **0.8** seconds. 
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, an extra **50%** of damage is dealt to enemies with less than **20%** HP.
Passive: When you use Shadoweave in Moonlight Realm, you will blink away from the target when incoming damage is detected. Cooldown: **10** seconds.

Passive: Weapons Master
Flame: When Shadoweave is paired with **2** flame weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Flame: Moonlight Realm. When a target is burned while in Flame: Moonlight Realm, they are burned for an extra **4** seconds. Targets with shield take an extra **15%** flame damage. 

Volt: When Shadoweave is paired with **2** volt weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Volt: Moonlight Realm. While in Volt: Moonlight Realm, dodging has a **65%** chance of not consuming a dodge attempt, dodge attacks deal **5%** additional damage, and volt damage is increased by **10%**.

Frost: When Shadoweave is paired with **2** frost weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Frost: Moonlight Realm. While in Frost: Moonlight Realm, frost ATK is increased by **10%**.

Physical: When Shadoweave is paired with **2** physical weapons, Moonlight Realm is converted to Physical: Moonlight Realm. While in Physical: Moonlight Realm, deal damage equal to **50%** of ATK plus **300** to targets within attack range every second.

Balance: When Shadoweave is paired with any two different elemental weapons (among flame, volt, frost, and physical weapons), the Wanderer's ATK is increased by **15%** in the realm, and counted as activating flame, volt, frost, and physical resonance without resonance effects.

discharge.name: Gravity Weave
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Gravity Weave with a stronger absorption force, dealing damage equal to **368.5%** of ATK plus **2211**. Then explode and create a ranged diffusion wave after **5** seconds, dealing damage equal to **184.3%** + **1106**. Damage immunity lasts **1.5** seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description:
Normal attacks now deal area damage upon hit.
When there is another epiphyllum within the epiphyllum explosion area, increase the damage of each of the subsequent epiphyllum explosions by **0%**, up to a maximum of **1%**.
The epiphyllum generation interval from **Moonlight Realm** is now reduced to **0.5** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

The epiphyllum generation interval from **Moonlight Realm** is now reduced to **0.3** seconds.
Epiphyllums will attach to the enemy.
The duration of **Moonlight Realm** is now increased to **20** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
When under the effect of **Moonlight Realm**, gain **30** weapon charge every second and increase the damage of discharge skill by **0%**.

Switch modes on **Moonlight Realm** up to **2** times. Gain **1** attempt after skill cooldown and another **1** attempt by charging discharge.
Use any weapon discharge **3** times to gain **+**1**** on the **Moonlight Realm** count. Effective even when Shadoweave is in the off-hand slot.
When under the effect of **Moonlight Realm**, increase attack by **0%**.

matrice.name: Lin
matrice.description: Responsibility that comes with identity, a burden and a trial.

set.set_2: Increase ATK by **2%**/**3%**/**3%**/**4%** on hit for **18** seconds, stacking up to **5** times. Only the highest level is effective when effects are duplicated.
set.set_4: Every **5**m traveled within Moonlight Realm grants **1** stack of Moonlight, increasing final damage by **4%**/**5%**/**6%**/**7%** for **15** seconds, stacking up to **3** times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
